member.name: IURLSearchHook2.TranslateWithSearchContext
member.summary: Called by the browser when the browser cannot determine the protocol of a URL address. This method uses a search context to determine the protocol.
member.param: The address of a wide character buffer that, on entry, contains the URL address for which the browser is trying to determine the protocol. On exit, this buffer contains the modified URL address if the method was successful.
The size, in characters, of the buffer at lpwszSearchURL.
A pointer to an object. This parameter can be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IURLSearchHook2
member.summary: Exposes a method that is used by the browser to translate the address of an unknown URL protocol by using a search context object.
